scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm --parallel -r clean && pnpm store prune
scripts.clean:purge: pnpm run clean && pnpm store clear
scripts.dev: RUNTIME=node docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.node.yml up
scripts.dev:bun: pnpm clean && RUNTIME=bun docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.bun.yml up
scripts.migrate:create: docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml up -d postgres && pnpm -r run migrate:create
scripts.migrate:down: docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml up -d postgres && pnpm -r run migrate:down
scripts.migrate:init: docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml up -d postgres && pnpm -r run migrate:init
scripts.migrate:up: docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml up -d postgres && pnpm -r run migrate:up
